overview: When Margot (Julia Ann) discovers that her husband Darryl (Randy Spears) is cheating on her, she angrily demands a divorce. But that night, in her sleep, her dreams take her on a surreal journey. A journey that reveals the truth about her once loving relationship that will change her mind and her life forever. She hears the mysterious line: "Sometimes you just need some insight, the kind of insight you can only get in your dreams."
title: Rapture In Blue
